title: ADL color scale — scale_adl
text: type character string indicating type color palette. two options: Categorical used diverging discrete palettes. Sequential used sequential palettes. palette character string indicating name palette (e.g., "likert_6"). info see different color palettes available, check adl_palettes. aesthetic Character string vector character strings listing name(s) aesthetic(s) scale works . can useful, example, apply colour settings colour fill aesthetics time, via aesthetic = c("colour", "fill") n number colors. direction character string indicating order colors reversed. two values: "original" keep original order colors "reverse" flips order colors legend_title character string indicating title legend . three options : legend_title left blank. happens title scale taken first mapping used aesthetic legend_title = "none" happens title removed legend legend_title = "string" happens legend title becomes whatever string (case title "string") legend_order character string indicating order colors labels legend reversed. Currently two options: "original" keeps original order legend "reverse" flips order legend ... additional arguments pass scale_fill_manual
